The languishing lady; or, The false-hearted lovers vnspeakable cruelty. To an excellent new tune.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : music.
Printed for C[harles]. Bates, next door to the Crown-Tavern in West-Smithfield., [London] : [1695?]
Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing. Verse: "VVelcome death, the cure of all my sorrow ..." Printed in two columns. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
